results.title: Evaluation of some pharmaceutical formulations of lisinopril through dissolution testing.

results.text_hl: ...AIM: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ is a drug of the angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor class that is primarily used in treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@congestive heart failure@@@, @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@heart attacks@@@ and also in preventing @DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@renal and retinal complications@@@ of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

results.title: [Effects of lisinopril on diabetic peripheral neuropathy: experiment with rats].
results.text_hl: The @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomly divided into 2 groups: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ group treated with gastric perfusion of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ daily for 8 weeks, and @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ control group.
